data.comment: The match has started.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Hajime Matsuo signals a Tokyo throw-in in Gamba's half.
Throw-in for Tokyo at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Tokyo's Arthur Silva breaks free at Panasonic Stadium Suita. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 4, Hajime Matsuo awards Gamba a goal kick.
Gamba's Ademilson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
In the minute 6, Free kick for Gamba in the half of Tokyo.
Takashi Usami of Gamba smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Tokyo take a 0-1 lead thanks to Diego Oliveira.
In the minute 10, Free kick Tokyo.
In Suita a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Gamba needs to be cautious. Tokyo have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 12, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Tokyo.
Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Gamba.
Throw-in Tokyo.
In the minute 14, Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Gamba.
Gamba drives forward and Kosuke Onose gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Gamba have a goal kick.
In the minute 18, Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Gamba.
In the minute 23, Gamba's Ryu Takao gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Tokyo defender.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
In Suita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 27, Gamba have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
Gamba's Yosuke Ideguchi misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Tokyo at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 30, Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Tokyo in their own half.
Tokyo pushes forward through Kensuke Nagai, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 32, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Tokyo.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Suita.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 39, Yojiro Takahagi is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Yojiro Takahagi returns to the field for Tokyo after picking up a slight injury.
Hajime Matsuo signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 43, Takashi Usami grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Ademilson with an assist there.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Gamba to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
In Suita, Yojiro Takahagi of Tokyo is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 45, Tokyo's Leandro is whistled for offside at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Gamba are whistled for offside.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Hajime Matsuo awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Tokyo in the half of Gamba.
Yosuke Ideguchi (Gamba) has received a yellow card from Hajime Matsuo.
Can Tokyo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
In the minute 53, Can Tokyo capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Shuto Abe gets his shot on target but fails to score for Tokyo.
In the minute 55, Gamba have a goal kick.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 56, Joan Oumari (Tokyo) has received a first yellow card.
Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Gamba in the half of Tokyo.
In the minute 59, Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tokyo are coming forward and Leandro gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
In the minute 60, Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Kenta Hasegawa is making the team's first substitution at Panasonic Stadium Suita with Takuya Uchida replacing Yojiro Takahagi.
The away team have replaced Hotaka Nakamura with Ryoya Ogawa. This is the second substitution made today by Kenta Hasegawa.
In the minute 62, Arthur Silva for Tokyo gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
In the minute 63, Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Tokyo have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
In Suita Tokyo attack through Diego Oliveira. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 65, Hajime Matsuo awards Gamba a goal kick.
Throw-in for Tokyo at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Takashi Usami for Gamba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 68, It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
Kazuma Watanabe is replacing Ademilson for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Tsuneyasu Miyamoto (Gamba) is making a first substitution, with Shu Kurata replacing Ryu Takao.
In the minute 69, Throw-in Gamba.
Adailton is on a sub for Kensuke Nagai for Tokyo.
Tokyo to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
In the minute 71, Hajime Matsuo awards the home team a throw-in.
Penalty! Hajime Matsuo points to the spot, great chance for Tokyo...
Goal! Leandro gives Tokyo a 1-2 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 76, Takashi Usami of Gamba gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
Takashi Usami (Gamba) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
In the minute 80, Gamba make their fourth substitution with Patric replacing Kim Young-Gwon.
Tsuneyasu Miyamoto (Gamba) is making a third substitution, with Yuji Ono replacing Shinya Yajima.
In the minute 81, Great finish from Adailton to give Tokyo a 1-3 lead.
Great play from Leandro to set up the goal.
The away team replace Diego Oliveira with Tsuyoshi Watanabe.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
Yuya Fukuda is replacing Hiroki Fujiharu for the home team.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
In the minute 85, Hajime Matsuo signals a Tokyo throw-in in Gamba's half.
Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo awards Tokyo a goal kick.
In the minute 87, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Patric (Gamba) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Tokyo defenders.
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Suita Gamba attack through Shu Kurata. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Tokyo at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Throw-in Tokyo.
Tokyo have a goal kick.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Hajime Matsuo.
Hajime Matsuo awards Tokyo a goal kick.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
Hajime Matsuo signals a Gamba throw-in in Tokyo's half.
Throw-in for Tokyo at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Tokyo are pushing forward but Leandro's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Patric of Gamba is pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-3.
Akihiro Hayashi is booked for the away team.
